workshops.name: Sharon Holliday
workshops.title: Exceptional Scala Workshop
workshops.details:
Sharon will be running a workshop on some techniques for dealing
          with, or avoiding exceptions in Scala!

workshops.name: Khan Thompson
workshops.title: Building a Basic Haskell Web-Service in Servant

workshops.name: Vaibhav Sagar
workshops.title: Git Internals Workshop
workshops.details:
Vaibhav will be presenting a talk followed by a workshop on the internals of Git.

Let's walk through a Git repository together and implement a Git of our own one step at a time.

See the related blog-post: I Haskell a Git!
workshops.prereqs:
• Basic competence with using Git and knowledge of Haskell and/or Python 3
  • Have stack and python3 installed
  • Nix is nice but not required

talks.name: Dave Laing
talks.title: A Pile of Things About Reflex

talks.name: Andy Kitchen (MC)
talks.title: Un-Recruiting - Session for FP-People and FP-Jobs in Melbourne
